alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 12:35PM EDT until July 15 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1234 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Port Everglades, or 7 miles northeast of Hallandale, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar and Davie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, Biscayne Bay...nd may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
